title: Poland's president says he will sign Holocaust bill
text:
Poland's president says he will sign Holocaust bill 6:07pm GMT - 00:57 
Poland's President Andrzej Duda says he will sign a Holocaust bill into law, despite protests from Israel and the United States. Anna Bevan reports.   
Poland's President Andrzej Duda says he will sign a Holocaust bill into law, despite protests from Israel and the United States. Anna Bevan reports.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/02/06/polands-president-says-he-will-sign-holo?videoId=391344984&videoChannel=13422
